attributes.action: Commission a statue to commemorate injured troops
attributes.additional_details:
There are numerous statues for soldiers who died in conflicts, who are serving, but there are NONE for service personnel injured during service.

Could a statue be commissioned to represent those who paid a high price for serving their country.

This could take the form of an amputee, some one blinded, someone handicapped and someone suffering from mental scars.

These people to deserve recognition and have long been the forgotten heroes
